actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1274.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 12929 making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12929 (Appropriations for the Departments of Labor and Health, Education, and Welfare and for related agencies).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 12929 making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.
